碾.definition: stone roller; roller and millstone; to grind; to crush; to husk

碾場.definition: to thresh or husk grain on a threshing ground (dialect)

碾壓.definition: to crush or compact (with a roller); to run over (with a vehicle); (fig.) to trounce; to wipe the floor with; to be far superior

碾子山.definition: Nianzishan district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

碾子山區.definition: Nianzishan district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

碾磨.definition: to mill; to grind; grinding stone

碾過.definition: to crush sth by running over it
